http://www.newscientist.com/article/mg19325931.300-the-neanderthal-within.html
 Since 1987 the 'Out of Africa' model has been dominant in the field of human development based on the "Mitochondrial Eve". Now that Haplotypes have been identified and are being traced it seems there may be some hybridisation with Homo neanderthalensis and possibly with Homo erectus The details are expected to become clearer when the Neanderthal genome is fully sequenced in 2 years, but the discoveries may revive the multiregionalism hypothesis.
 It also produces more intrest in the Lagar Velho child.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Neanderthal hybridisation
